tool_description:
This api helps to detect disposable email services during your signup process to minimize fake accounts. It covers the largest number of blacklist domains available such as mailinator (including thousands of alternative domains), emailondeck, fake-mail.com, ...

Try it for free and convince yourself.
name: disposable temporary email detector
title: disposable temporary email detector

api_list.name: domain name

required_parameters.name: domainname
required_parameters.description: domain name to check whether disposable or not

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://check-disposable-mail.p.rapidapi.com/ok.bdea.cc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "check-disposable-mail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://check-disposable-mail.p.rapidapi.com/{domainname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "check-disposable-mail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
